overview: When Violet (Violet Starr) catches her sexy roommate Mona (Mona Azar) spying on her while pleasuring herself, she invites her to join in the fun. The next day, Violet lures the voyeuristic Mona into a threesome with her boyfriend (Derrick Pierce). Then it's their turn to be voyeurs and watch Mona have sex with her partner (Will Pounder) before the girls decide to swap cocks for a bit of morning orgy fun. After all, the more the merrier!
title: My Sexy Roommate 2
